questions.name: Alex Trebek
questions.content: Toys for 500: Original sets of this toy that was first sold in 1918 included plans for building Uncle Tom's Cabin.
questions.note: Was it: Legos, Lincoln Logs, Fiddlestix and Woodbuilders

questions.name: Alex Trebek
questions.content: English for 500: Other than Q, these two letters appear the least in the names of states, each appearing only once.
questions.note: Is it: V and X, F and K, J and Z or X and Z?

questions.name: Alex Trebek
questions.content: Film for 500: One of the top 20, this 1946 film was based on a short story published as: The Man Who Was Never Born.
questions.note: Was it: Citizen Kane, It's a wonderful life, The invisable Man or Great Expectations?

questions.name: Alex Trebek
questions.content: History for 500: When Galveston was devastated by a hurricane in 1900, she traveled 1,500 miles to head up the relief effort.
questions.note: Clara Barton, Florence Nightingale, Helena Rubinstein or Molly Brown?

questions.name: Alex Trebek
questions.content: No matter how hopeless, no matter how far, to fight for the right without question is from this show.
questions.note: Man of La Manchea, Rent, Les Miserables or Camelot?
